Class dom.net.Receiver 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.net.Receiver
class Receiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class defines the 'run' method for the thread that is charged with receiving SessionViewPackets on the TCPConnection object defined above

See Also:

run

public void run()
Real action here. This just reads SessionViewPackets from off the wire forever and sends the processNetInput message to the connection handler defined in the myHandler instance variable.
